definition: loose goods/goods sold open/draft (of beer, as opposed to bottled)
scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: These strategies include buying raw materials in bulk and by mechanizing their operations.
sentences.chinese: 這些策略包括購買原材料和散裝機械化經營。

sentences.english: All highly flammable bulk storage containers will be kept in the oil storage room.
sentences.chinese: 所有高可燃性散裝貯存容器將被保存在石油儲存室。

sentences.english: The utility model fills the blank of the special tank car for transporting the bulk dry-mixed mortar in China.
sentences.chinese: 填補了國內幹混砂漿無散裝運輸專用罐車的空白。

sentences.english: One necessary aspect of bulk cargo is fungibility .
sentences.chinese: 散裝貨所必須具備的一個特徵是它的替換性。

sentences.english: The pub has several good beers on draft.
sentences.chinese: 這小酒店有幾種挺不錯的散裝啤酒。

sentences.english: Prices are the same as, or lower than, loose pills, and treatment is easier to finance.
sentences.chinese: 價格與散裝藥丸持平或者略低，治療費用較易承受。

sentences.english: You'll probably find Dave at the pool hall----he often hangs out there.
sentences.chinese: 你將可能發現德芙在客廳裏，而且經常散裝在那。

sentences.english: He admitted that it could also allow people to run pirated games.
sentences.chinese: 他承認，這也可能使人們能夠運行散裝光盤遊戲。

sentences.english: Often you'll get a better deal for buying in bulk too.
sentences.chinese: 買散裝商品常常會更實惠。

sentences.english: Sales of small inexpensive gifts "Gala" Christmas in Bethlehem and in "bulk.
sentences.chinese: 小便宜的聖誕禮物銷售的散裝和在伯利恆。

sentences.english: Storage of big stack of bagged grain in bulk bin were tested.
sentences.chinese: 本文對散裝倉大堆垛包裝儲糧進行了探討。

sentences.english: Shipping , bulk carrier , ship price , hire rate , vector autoregression.
sentences.chinese: 海運，散裝，船價，租金，向量自我迴歸。

sentences.english: By 1894, the Samuels were supplying kerosene to Shanghai in bulk.
sentences.chinese: 1894年，森默兄弟已用散裝油輪運送煤油到上海。

sentences.english: PSCO: Captain, the supplement to Certificate of Fitness for the Carriage of Dangerous Chemicals in Bulk is missing.
sentences.chinese: 船長，散裝船運輸危險化學品適裝證書的附頁不見了。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the nitrite content of unpacked salted vegetables marketed in Xinxiang City.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解新鄉市市售散裝鹽醃菜中亞硝酸鹽的含量。

sentences.english: The green beans can be supplied in bulk or in gunny bags.
sentences.chinese: 青豆可以散裝，也可以用麻袋裝。

definition: to reconstitute (a powdered beverage) by adding water, milk etc
date of use (on foodstuffs)/best before date
variant of 滷味|卤味[lu3 wei4]
